Fighter.name: Front Liner
Fighter.desc: Whenever an enemy finishes their movement in the Space directly in front of this character, the character makes an immediate attack before the enemy finishes their turn.

Rogue.name: Stealth
Rogue.desc: When standing in Obscuring Terrain this character cannot be targeted by ranged attacks.

Mage.name: Wands and Staves
Mage.desc: This character can equip wands and staves (others can’t).

Legionnaire.name: Defensive Formation
Legionnaire.desc: When standing adjacent to allied characters facing the same direction as them, this character gains a +5 boost to Defensive Ability for each, but only from attacks in the direction that this character is currently facing

Legionnaire.name: Aggressive Formation
Legionnaire.desc: When standing adjacent to allied characters facing the same direction as them, this character gains a +5 boost to Attack Accuracy for each.

Legionnaire.name: Shieldwall
Legionnaire.desc: Characters standing on either side of this character gain a bonus to Defensive Ability equal to half of the bonus to Defensive Ability that this character gains from their equipment, but only from attacks in the direction that this character is currently facing.

Berserker.name: Bloodlust
Berserker.desc: Whenever this character scores a Critical Hit, they gain TP equal to half of the damage they cause.

Berserker.name: Second Wind
Berserker.desc: When this character’s HP are pushed below 10% (but they have not fainted), they regain all TP and gain an immediate turn.

Berserker.name: Frenzy
Berserker.desc: If this character’s attack defeats or causes an enemy to faint, they gain an immediate additional turn during which they cannot use Frenzy again.

Vanguard.name: Armoured Attack
Vanguard.desc: Encumbrance does not affect this character’s Attack Accuracy.

Vanguard.name: Armoured Defense
Vanguard.desc: Encumbrance does not affect this character’s Defensive Ability.

Vanguard.name: Armoured March
Vanguard.desc: Encumbrance does not affect this character’s Move.

Archer.name: Bowmanship
Archer.desc: This character may equip bows (others can’t).

Archer.name: Sniper
Archer.desc: All ranged weapons have +2 Range in this character’s hands.

Archer.name: Multi-Targeting
Archer.desc: When this character is able to make an additional attack with a ranged weapon due to Weapon Speed, they may choose to aim that attack at a different target.

Skirmisher.name: Dual Wielder
Skirmisher.desc: When fighting with a weapon in either hand, Defensive Ability and Attack Speed are increased by +5 each.

Skirmisher.name: Flanking Strike
Skirmisher.desc: When attacking an enemy from either side (but not the front or back), this character gains a +30 bonus to Attack Speed.

Skirmisher.name: Whirlwind Defense
Skirmisher.desc: Whenever this character is about to be attacked, they automatically turn to face that attack, gaining all defensive bonuses for facing the enemy.

Assassin.name: Backstab
Assassin.desc: Any attack on a foe who does not get a defense roll (such as from behind them) has its Crit Chance tripled.

Assassin.name: Critical Mastery
Assassin.desc: All Critical Hits dealt by this character deal bonus damage equal to their Skill + Level.

Assassin.name: Critical Flurry
Assassin.desc: Additional attacks on this character’s turn (those gained from Attack Speed) have their Crit Chance increased by +20.

Elementalist.name: Fire Strike
Elementalist.desc: When this character attacks using only a wand, staff, or their fists, they gain a bonus to damage equal to their Skill which cannot be absorbed by DR.

Elementalist.name: Deflecting Whirlwind
Elementalist.desc: Ranged attacks against this character suffer a penalty to Attack Accuracy equal to this character’s Skill.

Elementalist.name: Wind Walking
Elementalist.desc: This character’s movements ignore all terrain, and they may pass over spaces occupied by enemies.

Illusionist.name: Illusionary Attack
Illusionist.desc: Targets of this character’s attacks suffer a -1 Penalty to Defensive Ability against those attacks for every 10 TP the attacker currently has.

Illusionist.name: Illusionary Defense
Illusionist.desc: This character gains a +1 Bonus to Defensive Ability for every 10 TP  they currently have.

Illusionist.name: Draining Strike
Illusionist.desc: All damage dealt to enemies also reduces their TP equal to the damage dealt.

Healer.name: Stabilizing Touch
Healer.desc: Any character this character carries is Stable while being carried by them.

Healer.name: Self Empowerment
Healer.desc: This character cannot be targeted by Debilitate Techniques.

Healer.name: Regenerating Aura
Healer.desc: Any allied character who ends their turn adjacent to this character gains +5 HP.
